content.html: Imagine having @jk_rowling on your side, raising 175K for a tribunal, and having a founder who is able to raise 550K for her own legal case from your supporters, and then arguing that the reason you can't get charitable acts done is lack of funding?! That's LGB Alliance's case.
content.value:
Imagine having @jk_rowling on your side, raising 175K for a tribunal, and having a founder who is able to raise 550K for her own legal case from your supporters, and then arguing that the reason you can't get charitable acts done is lack of funding?!

That's LGB Alliance's case.
